Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Client.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualClient, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class RMIClient extends UnicastRemoteObject implements VirtualClient, Runnable
RMIClient is the client-side implementation of the VirtualClient interface. It connects to the VirtualServer and handles user input and game updates.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the client, connecting to the server and starting the user interface. If the UI choice is not GUI, it runs the command line interface.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • close
